thread.title: Moto G5 alleged specs leaked, 5-inch full HD display and Snapdragon 430 in tow
thread.title_full: Moto G5 alleged specs leaked, 5-inch full HD display and Snapdragon 430 in tow

title: Moto G5 alleged specs leaked, 5-inch full HD display and Snapdragon 430 in tow
text:
Moto G5 alleged specs leaked, 5-inch full HD display and Snapdragon 430... Moto G5 alleged specs leaked, 5-inch full HD display and Snapdragon 430 in tow By January 30, 2017 “The Moto G5 will be a toned-down variant of the Moto G5 Plus” 
Lenovo is expected to unveil the Moto G5 and Moto G5 budget smartphones at its February 26th pre-MWC event in Barcelona. Ahead of the unveiling, a number of live images and press renders of the Moto G5 Plus alongside its specs had already leaked. Now it’s smaller sibling, the Moto G5’s alleged specs have also surfaced on the interwebs. 
Brazilian blog Tecnoblog found a “Moto G5 XT1672” in an online retailer’s database, which has revealed a couple of its specs.   Moto G5 will be a stripped-down version of its bigger sibling, the Moto G5 Plus. The phone will offer a 5-inch full HD display, and boot Android Nougat out of the box. It will be powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 SoC, mated to 2GB of RAM. It will come with 32GB of expandable storage, a 2,800mAh battery, a 13MP rear snapper, a 5MP front shooter and 4G LTE connectivity. 
The source didn’t provide any photo of the Moto G5. However, reports suggest that it will share its design with the Moto G5 Plus. As per the rumour mill, both phones will be launched in India in March soon after the unveiling at MWC.
